plot: Pipo and Mamaloe accompany their Indian friend Klukkluk on his way home to Berezonië and find themselves racing against the greedy circus director who wants to claim the leadership of Klukkluk's tribe for himself.
plot_en: Pipo and Mamaloe accompany their Indian friend Klukkluk on his way home to Berezonië and find themselves racing against the greedy circus director who wants to claim the leadership of Klukkluk's tribe for himself.
plot_es: Pipo and Mamaloe accompany their Indian friend Klukkluk on his way home to Berezonië and find themselves racing against the greedy circus director who wants to claim the leadership of Klukkluk's tribe for himself.
title: Pipo de clown
